title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bathroom Home in Denver Connection Community!
map_address: Jasper Street near East Bolling Dr
posting_body: ['This gorgeous newer build home is available August 1st!', 'With 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and a spacious loft, this home is perfect for a small family or couple looking to live in the Gateway-Green Valley Ranch area (a Denver Connection community).', 'This home features an open floor plan, with wood floors on the main level, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, an attached 2-car garage, and includes a washer and dryer.', 'Denver Connection community includes dog park, community club house with pool, hot tub, and grills, and proximity to the upcoming town center project, "The Flyway!"', 'More information at <URL>.', 'You are also close to DIA (15 minutes), downtown Denver (20 minutes), & public transit station (40th street just blocks away!).', 'Grocery, restaurants, nail salon and cleaners within 1 to 3 miles.', "**RECEIVE $300 OFF 1ST MONTH'S RENT IF APPLICATION IS SUBMITTED AND APPROVED BY JULY 15th**", 'Details:', 'Beds/Baths: 3BD/2.5BA', 'Square Feet: 2,011', 'Rental Terms:', 'Rent: $2,800.00/month', 'Security Deposit: $2,800.00', 'Application Fee: $75.00', 'Available: August 1st', 'Utilities Included: Trash', "Other utilities will be tenant's responsibility", "*Proof of Renter's Insurance Required*", "*Must apply directly on our website - We don't accept outside applications*", '<URL>']
